General.Name: Goldspot Discoveries Corp
General.Description: EarthLabs Inc., a mining investment and technology company, provides artificial intelligence and data science to mineral deposits in Canada. The company provides a range of cloud-based and interoperable web applications. It also offers CEO.CA, a social network for investors and traders in junior resource and venture stocks with online and mobile functionality; DigiGeoAtlas platform, a software-based GIS interactive mapping interface alongside its DigiGeoMaps distribution business; DigiGeoData, a software-based interactive mapping interface, which provides earth modeling, geology data management, and specialized financial products; and DigiGeoMaps that provides an overview on a global/country scale or regional basis for exploration and/or mining activity. The company was formerly known as GoldSpot Discoveries Corp. and changed its name to EarthLabs Inc. in September 2022. EarthLabs Inc. is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 69 Yonge Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5E 1K3
